pages.title: Kinetic Proxy
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Converts mechanical power RPM into machine input or accepts commands from programmable gearboxes.

Function $(br2)Currently supports bearings and pistons:$(li)Bearings (Velocity Mode): Place on the proxy's interface side.$(li)Pistons (Velocity Mode): Speed is scaled. Programmable gearboxes can send position/velocity commands.

Notes $(li)In Velocity Mode, programmable gearbox commands adjust Target speed internally. Low speeds may fail to reach targets.$(li)Kinematic machines avoid these issues but still struggle at very low speeds.
